title: Hour 2: NFC Least
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. Smith, Michael Irvin, and Ryan Clark debate which NFC East team is in the worst position after Week 1. "The Playmaker" himself Michael Irvin gives us his top 3 playmakers from this weekend's action. The crew debates whether or not Baltimore's offense is elite after a decisive performance from Lamar Jackson in yesterday's win. Plus, are we more disappointed in Derek Carr's performance against the Chargers or more impressed with Justin Herbert? Patrick Mahomes quickly got into midseason form with 5 touchdowns against Arizona while Joe Burrow struggled with 5 turnovers. Stephen A. and the crew tell us which star QB's performance is the bigger deal. And, we predict how Russell Wilson's Denver debut will play out on Monday Night Football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
